data.expected_result: User B's name or "You" should display as the user name that sent the message.
data.short_description: Direct reply to notification on 9.0 shows "Discord" as username
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a DM from User A to User B - User B receives notification on 9.0 Android phone - User B swipes down notification and taps on the action to reply - User B types in a response then press the send button - Note the notification updates with the message that was sent.
